rules: Overlines must be uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Never use Inter for main headings

primary.name: Classic Red
primary.usage: Primary Actions, 'Book Now' Buttons, Important Alerts

secondary.name: Trust Green
secondary.usage: Success States, Confirmations, Safe Actions, Price Tags

rules: No gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise.
Text must never be pure black (#000000). Use zinc-900 or zinc-800.
Primary buttons should be Rose-600 with white text.
Secondary buttons should be Zinc-100 with Zinc-900 text.

marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Never fill 100% perfectly.

buttons.size: Big (h-12 or h-14 for main actions)
buttons.classes: rounded-full font-semibold shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all active:scale-95

cards.classes: bg-white border border-zinc-200 shadow-sm rounded-xl hover:border-rose-200 transition-colors

inputs.classes: bg-zinc-50 border-zinc-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-rose-100 focus:border-rose-500 rounded-lg h-11

calendar.notes: Use Shadcn Calendar but style selected dates with Rose-600 and today with Emerald-600 dot.

assets.icons: Lucide React (default) or Phosphor Icons (for dashboard)

sections: Hero: Big bold value prop, 'Book Now' Rose button, abstract 3D shape or clean UI screenshot.
Features: Bento grid layout showing Calendar, Invoice, and Email features.

dashboard.layout: Sidebar navigation (left), Top header (search/profile), Main content area (grid).

booking_flow.layout: Centered card or split screen (Info left, Form right).

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'DoBook' brand using the Rose/Emerald/Zinc palette.
Focus on the 'Booking Widget' being embeddable (iframe friendly design).
Ensure the Invoice templates look distinct (Classic, Modern, Minimal).
Use the 'Tetris Grid' for the landing page to make it stand out.
Don't ask clarifying questions. Use your best judgment based on this guide.
